input.description:
adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter to use to handle the request.
Default value: VMwareInfrastructure

items The items XML used to perform "Customize VM" operation.
Value takes the form:
<items> <item> <parameters> <virtual-machine></virtual-machine> <spec> <identity type='CustomizationSysprep'> <gui-unattended> <password> <value></value> <plain-text></plain-text> </password> <time-zone></time-zone> <auto-logon></auto-logon> <auto-logon-count></auto-logon-count> </gui-unattended> <user-data> <full-name></full-name> <org-name></org-name> <computer-name> <name></name> </computer-name> <product-id></product-id> </user-data> <gui-run-once> <command></command> </gui-run-once> <identification> <join-workgroup></join-workgroup> <join-domain></join-domain> <domain-admin></domain-admin> <domain-admin-password> <value></value> <plain-text></plain-text> </domain-admin-password> </identification> <license-file-print-data> <auto-mode></auto-mode> <auto-users></auto-users> </license-file-print-data> </identity> <globalIPSettings> <dns-suffix-list> <dns-suffix-list></dns-suffix-list> </dns-suffix-list> <dns-server-list> <dns-server-list></dns-server-list> </dns-server-list> </globalIPSettings> <nic-setting-map> <adapter> <ip type="CustomizationDhcpIpGenerator"> <ipAddress></ipAddress> </ip> <subnet-mask></subnet-mask> <gateway></gateway> <dns-server-list> <dns-server-list></dns-server-list> </dns-server-list> <dns-domain></dns-domain> </adapter> </nic-setting-map> </spec> </parameters> </item> </items>
For description of each parameter tags, please refer Construct Item for Customize VM process.

connection parameters [optional] The XML containing the metadata needed by the adapter to connect to the target.
Value takes the form:
<connection-parameters> <soap-url></soap-url> <transport></transport> <user-name></user-name> <password></password> </connection-parameters>

output.description: The adapter response containing the results.

documentation.description: Customizes a virtual machine's guest operating system
